Do I have to purchase them?

William Mac

Hi, do the VAM motors come with the motor brackets?? I keep asking but I get no answer.

Hi William Mac, Sorry for the delayed response—we just returned from vacation. Here's your shipping tracking link. The haptics have been out of stock for nearly two weeks due to overwhelming demand, but we'll ship yours within the next couple of days. We've included the U-shaped bracket for you, so no need to worry. https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047209606883
Hello, I'm missing the following: Desktop Fixed (Shifters) × 1 $19.90 Adapter plate × 1 $25.90 Elastomer × 1 New White $7.90 Will I be receiving this with the incoming VAM shipment? Thanks
Hi William Mac, They should have been delivered with the Handbrake. Please confirm.
Yes, I see them now. Was expecting them to be in a different box. I had not opened it yet.
